channel.title: [525] npc`s attack bug [525]
channel.description: Hey all. Im a new coder of 525 server`s, i coded 317 and 503+ like 508 and i tried too 562. Well in my server biggest problem now its this : Wheni try to attack a NPC they talk to me and say something like that :"WoW, Now you have to bring me Ice Amulet" or " Hi play nice, Synergy-pkz", of course i Use synergy pkz source. If i try antoehr sources have almost same problem i cant attack NPC`s. Can someone help me rezolve this BUG? I tried to change npccombat.java but nothing . I need help, TY. If help , my YAHOO email is : ady_bsty@yahoo.com or my ID ady_bsty. Bye and Good luck coding!

item.title: [525] npc`s attack bug [525]
item.dc:creator: @Ownz_Asul Ownz Asul
item.description:
@Ownz_Asul wrote:

    Hey all. Im a new coder of 525 server`s, i coded 317 and 503+ like 508 and i tried too 562.

Well in my server biggest problem now its this : Wheni try to attack a NPC they talk to me and say something like that :“WoW, Now you have to bring me Ice Amulet” or " Hi play nice, Synergy-pkz", of course i Use synergy pkz source. If i try antoehr sources have almost same problem i cant attack NPC`s.
Can someone help me rezolve this BUG? I tried to change npccombat.java but nothing . I need help, TY.
If help , my YAHOO email is : ady_bsty@yahoo.com or my ID ady_bsty. Bye and Good luck coding!
